title: Cloudant will make all attempts to notify you of legal demands for confidential information

tosdr.tldr: If Cloudant is required to disclose any confidential user information, they will provide a prompt prior written notice so that you can seek a protective order or other appropriate remedy and/or waive compliance with the terms of their TOS.
